title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 7
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Setsuna-chaaan~, give me some comments~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah, this is the interview for the upcoming Shuffle Festival, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah. We would like to hear how much you’re looking forward to it and how excited you are~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Leave it to me! My heart couldn’t stop pounding the moment we decided to hold the Shuffle Festival. To be able to sing everyone’s songs that I love is unreal.... Plus, the people who have always supported us will be choosing the songs for us! I can’t possibly approach this half-heartedly, can I? I’ll manage practice and my health until the day of the festival, and I want to shout out my love with all I’ve got!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oooh, your energy is on another level~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah.... I-, I’m sorry! I didn’t mean to raise my voice....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s fine, it’s fine. Kanata loves seeing the part of you that likes to blast off like that, Setsuna-chan. You make it seem really fun, and it makes me want to follow you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-san....! No, please don’t say things like you want to follow me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eeeh!? Why? You don’t want me to~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Because I want you to stand next to me and blast off together with me, Kanata-san!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
